title: Valley Park, Chandler's Ford
text:
Valley Park is a <a href="Civil%20parishes%20in%20England">civil parish</a> and a new town in the <a href="Test%20Valley">Test Valley</a> district of <a href="Hampshire">Hampshire</a>, England. The part of the parish is called <a href="Knightwood">Knightwood</a>.
History.
Valley Park sits near an <a href="Iron%20Age">Iron Age</a> settlement.
The area underwent a large amount of development from the mid-1980s to the 2000s. West of Knightwood Road was developed starting in 1994 and doubled the size of the town.
Amenities.
Valley Park has local schools, a supermarket, a community centre and a leisure centre.
